item.description: I'm trying to imagine all the snacks Trump ordered while he was watching the insurrection live on Fox News on Jan 6. How many Big Macs and Quarter Pounders. How many Diet Cokes? A taco salad perhaps? Plenty of chips! Twinkies. Bread pudding.
item.source:markdown: I'm trying to imagine all the snacks Trump ordered while he was watching the insurrection live on Fox News on Jan 6. How many Big Macs and Quarter Pounders. How many Diet Cokes? A taco salad perhaps? Plenty of chips! Twinkies. Bread pudding.

item.description: Are you going to watch the live January 6 hearings tonight?
item.source:markdown: Are you going to watch the live January 6 hearings tonight?

item.description:
A Walgreens employee refused to sell condoms to a couple on religious grounds. https://t.co/pWQxZTXW0v

They want to protect the life of the STDs.

We are required to carry the gonorrhea or syphilis virus to term.

PS: BTW, amazingly I spelled gonorrhea correctly. ;-)
item.source:markdown:
A Walgreens employee refused to sell condoms to a couple on religious grounds. https://t.co/pWQxZTXW0v
They want to protect the life of the STDs.
We are required to carry the gonorrhea or syphilis virus to term.
PS: BTW, amazingly I spelled gonorrhea correctly. ;-)

item.description: As revealed by the January 6 committee hearings, Fox hosts and analysts privately knew that Trump had lost the election. https://t.co/Sc53VdVkpW

item.description:
Craig Burton, a Utah tech visionary from the 80s, has died. https://t.co/lpYtWsW5LP

I hope people can reach the Facebook page.

It's all there is right now.

I look to @dsearls to create a public memorial on the web. That's how I met Craig, through Doc.

Craig was a very wise man.
item.source:markdown:
Craig Burton, a Utah tech visionary from the 80s, has died. https://t.co/lpYtWsW5LP
I hope people can reach the Facebook page.
It's all there is right now.
I look to @dsearls to create a public memorial on the web. That's how I met Craig, through Doc.
Craig was a very wise man.
